Name: OT4-RF (4x Telescopic)
Description:
Manufacturer: Gemini 
Type: Telescopic
Attachment Point: Optic   
Magnification: 4x
Size: 2

Combining a premium 4x telescopic sight with Gemini's innovative echoburst rangefinder, the OT4-RF model allows you to accurately gauge the distance to your target; vital for effective precision shooting. When paired with the Gemini S71 or other compatible weapon, the OT4-RF is engineered to impress in a variety of situations and engagements.
